name: Falconer Kluri
description: A sharp-eyed mercenary, and friend of Fluri
story: Kluri started raising a falcon in hope of reducing her workload. Although it ended up doing the exact opposite, she's carried on raising it for fun. Perhaps it learned from its master, because it will never do anything too difficult unless Kluri orders it to.
get_line: I'm Kluri, a mercenary. My motto is minimum effort, maximum reward, so don't give me anything too difficult.

relations.description: Kluri's commander in the Longtail Company. Kluri worries she is squandering all of her money on frivolous things.
Kluri seems to have a sense of rivalry against Silk. Now that she's stronger, Kluri thinks she'll be able to surpass her.
An Elf she once knew in Dun Blyraia. No matter how Kiris changes, Kluri will always trust her.
Seeing how skilled Basar is, Kluri hopes to one day be employed as an escort for his merchant guild.

specialty.name: Born in the Woods
specialty.description: She can smell the woods even from the middle of a desert.

skills.description: Slams the enemy, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Fluri, Attack!
skills.description: Fluri flies towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs, before a {{variable}} chance to provoke for 2 turns.
skills.enhanced_description: Fluri flies towards the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel all buffs, before a {{variable}} chance each to provoke and decrease Defense for 2 turns.

enhancements.description: Increases Defense.
Increases Defense by 1%.
Increases Defense by 2.5%.
Increases Defense by 5%.
Increases damage dealt by Light Step proportional to Defense.
Increases damage dealt by Light Step proportional to Defense by 5%.
Increases damage dealt by Light Step proportional to Defense by 15%.
Increases damage dealt by Light Step proportional to Defense by 30%.
When Magic Resist is activated, if the caster is at full Health, they are granted a barrier proportional to their max Health for 2 turns.
When Magic Resist is activated, if the caster is at full Health, they are granted a barrier proportional to 1% of their max Health for 2 turns.
When Magic Resist is activated, if the caster is at full Health, they are granted a barrier proportional to 2.5% of their max Health for 2 turns.
When Magic Resist is activated, if the caster is at full Health, they are granted a barrier proportional to 5% of their max Health for 2 turns.
When using Light Step, further increases Combat Readiness.
When using Light Step, increases Combat Readiness by an additional 1%.
When using Light Step, increases Combat Readiness by an additional 2.5%.
When using Light Step, increases Combat Readiness by an additional 5%.
When Magic Resist is activated, recovers Health of all allies.
When Magic Resist is activated, recovers Health of all allies by 0.5%.
When Magic Resist is activated, recovers Health of all allies by 1%.
When Magic Resist is activated, recovers Health of all allies by 2%.
Increases Speed.
Increases Speed by 1.
Increases Speed by 2.
Increases Speed by 4.
Increases buff dispel chance of Fluri, Attack!
Increases buff dispel chance of Fluri, Attack! by 5%.
Increases buff dispel chance of Fluri, Attack! by 15%.
Increases buff dispel chance of Fluri, Attack! by 25%.
Has a chance to increase Combat Readiness of a random ally by 10% after using Light Step.
Has a 25% chance to increase Combat Readiness of a random ally by 10% after using Light Step.
Has a 50% chance to increase Combat Readiness of a random ally by 10% after using Light Step.
Has a 100% chance to increase Combat Readiness of a random ally by 10% after using Light Step.
Chance to increase Combat Readiness by 50% at the end of the turn.
2% chance to increase Combat Readiness by 50% at the end of the turn.
5% chance to increase Combat Readiness by 50% at the end of the turn.
10% chance to increase Combat Readiness by 50% at the end of the turn.
Increases Speed.
Increases Speed by 1.
Increases Speed by 3.
Increases Speed by 5.

debuffs.name: Provoke
debuffs.effect: Target attacks the enemy who provoked them with a basic skill at the start of the turn.

skill1.name: 軽やかなステップ
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、自身のアクションゲージを15.0%UPさせる。自身の防御力が高いほど与えるダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 魔法耐性
skill2.desc: 毎ターン開始時、自身の生命力を5.0%回復する。

skill3.name: ホロリー突撃！
skill3.desc: 75.0%の確率で対象の強化効果をすべて解除し、75.0%の確率で挑発を2ターンの間付与する。
skill3.soul_description: 75.0%の確率で対象の強化効果をすべて解除し、75.0%の確率で挑発を2ターンの間付与する。
